title: unnaip-piDittu
sahitya:
unnaip-piDittuk-koNDEn ini uDalaip-pirindAlum uyiraip-pirivEnO


anupallavi

  anniyamillAda tannan tanimaiyilE Aghu minnaluDan Eghu minnal pOlE


caraNam    EkarasamAna bhOga uNarvilE electranaikkaduviya purODanaip-pOlE
shOka mOhamillA sutantara veLiyilE shuddha mukta samatva sattiya jyOtiyE
